content: I’m a huge fan of Richard Painter a life-long Republican who voted for Clinton and that in itself speaks volumes. I’m quite sure if mainstream Republicans can regain control of the white nationalist supremacists that have hijacked it, Mr. Painter will resume supporting the Republican Party. In the meantime, I am thrilled that N. Eisen and R. Painter are taking up this challenge. I have enormous faith that they will be successful in holding Trump accountable for his flagrant disregard for the law and the American people.
